description.value: To keep the peace, you disrupt those who seek to break it. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Deafness] and 4th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Silence] once per day each as innate spells. The tradition of these spells is the one you chose for the Nantambu Chime-Ringer Dedication feat.

publication.title: Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind
